name: SMACKHEAD
description: Your comatose and trapped in a dream. The only chance of waking up is by finding portals and advancing deeper into the dream to find a way out. But you are timed and need to collect clocks to give you more time running out will end the game.Theres enemy's you can smack  with your extendable hand and deadly traps you need to avoid. Featuring over 50 levels with bosses and puzzles to up the challenge can you complete all the levels of SMACKHEAD to escape from this strange dream and take the completion acheivement?
